title: New: Evenings – Stays
content:
Evenings has been an artist that unites the writers at CitR for a long time now. His 2011 record, Lately, had us on the floor, literally, begging for life to always be this damn good. Sort of.

Recently Evenings announced that, as he puts it, he would be “laying low”. The world does a little cry. Now me and Evenings might have slightly different opinions on what constitutes “laying Low”, but I’d assume that to most of the world it doesn’t mean; release a six minute, part soundscape, part soundtrack, part found sound jazz jam.

I’m glad Evenings doesn’t know what “laying Low” means.

Stays is part of the Friends of Friends compilation ‘Show Me The Future’, which is released next week.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
